titles.title: Safe and Efficient Transportation Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, relating to vehicle weight limitations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 5/4/1999--Introduced. Safe and Efficient Transportation Act - Authorizes a State to allow a vehicle combination of a truck tractor and one trailer or semitrailer with a consecutive set of tandem and tridem axles that may carry a gross load of 34,000 pounds on tandem axles and 51,000 pounds on tridem axles to use the Interstate System if the overall trailer length is at least 48 feet; except that such overall gross weight may not exceed 97,000 pounds for such a vehicle combination of six or more axles, including all enforcement tolerances.
